sections.heading: Contempt; penalty.The penalty for contempt of court, as provided in sections 29-3301 to 29-3307, shall not exceed thirty days' imprisonment in the county jail
sections.text: SourceLaws 1971, LB 568, ยง 7.AnnotationsThe identifying physical characteristics statutes require a showing of probable cause to believe the

sections.heading: 29-3301 to 29-3307 do not violate privilege against self-incrimination, are constitutional, and apply to physical evidence, not to oral communications or testimony
